Intrant.title: Make the whole "Add intrant" page flickable
Gray out empty menu categories
Intrant.description: For example, if there is no incubated intrants, then put the menu entry in the list, but don't make it available, e.g. gray it out

Intrant.title: Implement perpetual agenda
Intrant.description: The idea of the perpetual agenda is that the agenda sends you a notification at a later date about an incubated intrant.

Intrant.title: Implement the "One day maybe" incubation list
Intrant.description: In addition to the incubated intrants we want to be notified about at some date in the future, we need a list for incubated intrants that have no deadline. For example, intrants of the type "Learn Spanish", "Learn how to cook", "Go to Australia", etc., may belong to this list.

Intrant.title: Implement loading of references
Intrant.description: I have already connected the DataManager to the ReferencesModel::reload. I only need to implement the loading of the XML from the DataManager and the emission of the referencesLoaded signal.

Intrant.title: Implement filter for references
Intrant.description: The filter should filter over all the fields, i.e. title, description, urls, etc.

Intrant.title: Implement intrant addition in the intrant management page
